-- Create table create table BDC_DSQLR ( QLRID VARCHAR2(32) not null, XMID VARCHAR2(32) not null, QLRMC VARCHAR2(200), ZJZL NUMBER(2), ZJH VARCHAR2(100), TXDZ VARCHAR2(200), YB VARCHAR2(100), XB NUMBER(1), FRMC VARCHAR2(100), FRZJZL varchar2(20), FRZJH varchar2(500), FRDH VARCHAR2(100), DLRMC VARCHAR2(100), DLRDH VARCHAR2(100), DLRZJZL VARCHAR2(20), DLRZJH VARCHAR2(500), DLJG VARCHAR2(100), QLRLX NUMBER(2), QLRLB VARCHAR2(2), QLBL VARCHAR2(50), GYFS NUMBER(1), GYQK VARCHAR2(1000), DH VARCHAR2(100), BZ VARCHAR2(2000), SXH NUMBER
) pctfree 10 initrans 1 maxtrans 255 storage ( initial 2699 next 8 minextents 1 maxextents unlimited ); -- Add comments to the table comment on table BDC_DSQLR is '权利人'; -- Add comments to the columns comment on column BDC_DSQLR.QLRID is '权利人ID'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.XMID is '项目ID'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.QLRMC is '权利人名称'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.ZJZL is '证件种类'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.ZJH is '证件号'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.TXDZ is '通讯地址'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.YB is '邮编'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.XB is '性别'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.FRMC is '法人名称'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.FRDH is '法人电话'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.FRZJZL is '法人证件种类'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.FRZJH is '法人证件号'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.DLRMC is '代理人名称'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.DLRDH is '代理人电话'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.DLRZJZL is '代理人证件种类'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.DLRZJH is '代理人证件号'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.DLJG is '代理机构'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.QLRLX is '权利人类型'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.QLRLB is '第三权利人类别 1-权利人；2-义务人'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.GYFS is '共有方式'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.GYQK is '共有情况'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.DH is '电话'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.BZ is '备注'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.SXH is '顺序号'; comment on column BDC_DSQLR.QLBL is '权利比例'; -- Create/Recreate primary, unique and foreign key constraints alter table BDC_DSQLR add constraint PK_BDC_DSQLR primary key (QLRID) using index pctfree 10 initrans 2 maxtrans 255 storage ( initial 1408M next 1M minextents 1 maxextents unlimited ); -- Create/Recreate indexes create index FK_BDC_DSQLR_XMID on BDC_DSQLR (XMID) pctfree 10 initrans 2 maxtrans 255 storage ( initial 632M next 1M minextents 1 maxextents unlimited ); create index IDX_BDC_DSQLR_DLRMC on BDC_DSQLR (DLRMC) pctfree 10 initrans 2 maxtrans 255 storage ( initial 27M next 1M minextents 1 maxextents unlimited ); create index IDX_BDC_DSQLR_DLRZJH on BDC_DSQLR (DLRZJH) pctfree 10 initrans 2 maxtrans 255 storage ( initial 384K next 1M minextents 1 maxextents unlimited ); create index INDEX_BDC_DSQLR_QLRMC on BDC_DSQLR (QLRMC) pctfree 10 initrans 2 maxtrans 255 storage ( initial 640M next 1M minextents 1 maxextents unlimited ); create index INDEX_BDC_DSQLR_ZJH on BDC_DSQLR (ZJH) pctfree 10 initrans 2 maxtrans 255 storage ( initial 576M next 1M minextents 1 maxextents unlimited );

changeSet.sql:
create table BDC_XXBD_PZ ( pzid VARCHAR2(32) not null, bdlx VARCHAR2(32) not null, bdzd VARCHAR2(2000) not null, pzrxm VARCHAR2(100), pzsj DATE ) pctfree 10 initrans 1 maxtrans 255 storage ( initial 64K next 1M minextents 1 maxextents unlimited ); -- Add comments to the table comment on table BDC_XXBD_PZ is '不动产信息比对配置表'; -- Add comments to the columns comment on column BDC_XXBD_PZ.pzid is '配置ID'; comment on column BDC_XXBD_PZ.bdlx is '比对类型'; comment on column BDC_XXBD_PZ.bdzd is '比对字段'; comment on column BDC_XXBD_PZ.pzrxm is '配置人姓名'; comment on column BDC_XXBD_PZ.pzsj is '配置时间'; -- Create/Recreate indexes create unique index IDX_BDC_XXBD_PZ_BDLX on BDC_XXBD_PZ (BDLX); -- Create/Recreate primary, unique and foreign key constraints alter table BDC_XXBD_PZ add constraint BDC_XXBD_PZ_PK primary key (PZID);
-- Create table create table BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ ( pzid VARCHAR2(32) not null, bdlx VARCHAR2(32) not null, sjlymc VARCHAR2(100) not null, cs VARCHAR2(200) not null, qqfs VARCHAR2(10) not null, qqnr VARCHAR2(2000) not null, qqyy VARCHAR2(50), sjy VARCHAR2(100), pzrxm VARCHAR2(100), pzsj DATE, sxh NUMBER(10) ) pctfree 10 initrans 1 maxtrans 255 storage ( initial 64K next 1M minextents 1 maxextents unlimited ); -- Add comments to the table comment on table BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ is '不动产信息比对数据配置表'; -- Add comments to the columns comment on column BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ.pzid is '配置ID'; comment on column BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ.bdlx is '比对类型'; comment on column BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ.sjlymc is '数据来源名称'; comment on column BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ.cs is '参数'; comment on column BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ.qqfs is '请求方式'; comment on column BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ.qqnr is '请求内容'; comment on column BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ.qqyy is '请求应用'; comment on column BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ.sjy is '数据源'; comment on column BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ.pzrxm is '配置人姓名'; comment on column BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ.pzsj is '配置时间'; comment on column BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ.sxh is '顺序号'; -- Create/Recreate primary, unique and foreign key constraints alter table BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ add constraint BDC_XXBD_SJ_PZ_PK primary key (PZID);
